name: Deadly Traps
description: Battle yourself through dangerous traps in this fast-paced platformer.

recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or later Processor: Dual core processor with 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
